<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AMDGPU::V&#95;OR&#95;B32&#95;e64: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Patterns for dst&#95;unused:UNUSED&#95;PRESERVE.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// e.g., from:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// v&#95;add&#95;f16&#95;sdwa v0, v1, v2 dst&#95;sel:WORD&#95;1 dst&#95;unused:UNUSED&#95;PAD</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                           src1&#95;sel:WORD&#95;1 src2&#95;sel:WORD1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// v&#95;add&#95;f16&#95;e32 v3, v1, v2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// v&#95;or&#95;b32&#95;e32 v4, v0, v3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to SDWA preserve dst:v4 dst&#95;sel:WORD&#95;1 dst&#95;unused:UNUSED&#95;PRESERVE preserve:v3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if one of operands of v&#95;or&#95;b32 is SDWA instruction</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42;Op1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42;Op2) -&gt; CheckRetType &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Res = CheckOROperandsForSDWA(OrSDWA, OrOther);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that OtherInstr is actually bitwise compatible with SDWAInst = their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destination patterns don&#39;t overlap. Compatible instruction can be either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// regular instruction with compatible bitness or SDWA instruction with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// correct dst&#95;sel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SDWAInst | OtherInst bitness / OtherInst dst&#95;sel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -----------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DWORD    | no                    / no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// WORD&#95;0   | no                    / BYTE&#95;2/3, WORD&#95;1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// WORD&#95;1   | 8/16-bit instructions / BYTE&#95;0/1, WORD&#95;0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BYTE&#95;0   | no                    / BYTE&#95;1/2/3, WORD&#95;1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BYTE&#95;1   | 8-bit                 / BYTE&#95;0/2/3, WORD&#95;1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BYTE&#95;2   | 8/16-bit              / BYTE&#95;0/1/3. WORD&#95;0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BYTE&#95;3   | 8/16/24-bit           / BYTE&#95;0/1/2, WORD&#95;0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// E.g. if SDWAInst is v&#95;add&#95;f16&#95;sdwa dst&#95;sel:WORD&#95;1 then v&#95;add&#95;f16 is OK</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but v&#95;add&#95;f32 is not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: add support for non-SDWA instructions as OtherInst.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For now this only works with SDWA instructions. For regular instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there is no way to determine if the instruction writes only 8/16/24-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// out of full register size and all registers are at min 32-bit wide.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;isSDWA(&#42;OtherInst))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Convert the V&#95;ADD&#95;CO&#95;U32&#95;e64 into V&#95;ADD&#95;CO&#95;U32&#95;e32. This allows</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// isConvertibleToSDWA to perform its transformation on V&#95;ADD&#95;CO&#95;U32&#95;e32 into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// V&#95;ADD&#95;CO&#95;U32&#95;sdwa.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are transforming from a VOP3 into a VOP2 form of the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %19:vgpr&#95;32 = V&#95;AND&#95;B32&#95;e32 255,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       killed %16:vgpr&#95;32, implicit $exec</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %47:vgpr&#95;32, %49:sreg&#95;64&#95;xexec = V&#95;ADD&#95;CO&#95;U32&#95;e64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       %26.sub0:vreg&#95;64, %19:vgpr&#95;32, implicit $exec</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %48:vgpr&#95;32, dead %50:sreg&#95;64&#95;xexec = V&#95;ADDC&#95;U32&#95;e64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       %26.sub1:vreg&#95;64, %54:vgpr&#95;32, killed %49:sreg&#95;64&#95;xexec, implicit $exec</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// becomes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %47:vgpr&#95;32 = V&#95;ADD&#95;CO&#95;U32&#95;sdwa</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       0, %26.sub0:vreg&#95;64, 0, killed %16:vgpr&#95;32, 0, 6, 0, 6, 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       implicit-def $vcc, implicit $exec</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %48:vgpr&#95;32, dead %50:sreg&#95;64&#95;xexec = V&#95;ADDC&#95;U32&#95;e64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       %26.sub1:vreg&#95;64, %54:vgpr&#95;32, killed $vcc, implicit $exec</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SIPeepholeSDWA::pseudoOpConvertToVOP2(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnsubtarget">GCNSubtarget</a> &amp;ST)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((Opc == AMDGPU::V&#95;ADD&#95;CO&#95;U32&#95;e64 || Opc == AMDGPU::V&#95;SUB&#95;CO&#95;U32&#95;e64) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Currently only handles V&#95;ADD&#95;CO&#95;U32&#95;e64 or V&#95;SUB&#95;CO&#95;U32&#95;e64&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Can the candidate MI be shrunk?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;canShrink(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Opc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#a17fda9e2f2cb60c24bfdec02d7793b86">AMDGPU::getVOPe32</a>(Opc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the related ADD instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42;Sdst = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getNamedOperand(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, AMDGPU::OpName::sdst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Sdst)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42;NextOp = <a href="#a349ccb69c0901c3188afbce59873f56b">findSingleRegUse</a>(Sdst, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NextOp)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;MISucc = &#42;NextOp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a9719077fcba2cd439e84897257a47bb0">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure the carry in/out are subsequently unused.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42;CarryIn = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getNamedOperand(MISucc, AMDGPU::OpName::src2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CarryIn)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42;CarryOut = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getNamedOperand(MISucc, AMDGPU::OpName::sdst);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We expect, if we are here, that the instruction was already in it&#39;s SDWA form,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with a tied operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Dst &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>-&gt;isTied());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Opcode == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(SDWAOpcode));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We also expect a vdst, since sdst can&#39;t preserve.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PreserveDstIdx = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#a27efe1286cc31f5fc95355af30b0356c">AMDGPU::getNamedOperandIdx</a>(SDWAOpcode, AMDGPU::OpName::vdst);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Tied = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(TiedIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SDWAInst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a713eab58694282971c413a0d6de5975c">add</a>(Tied);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SDWAInst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#aa37e31e5df481d2f8a6f9f022886cf5e">tieOperands</a>(PreserveDstIdx, SDWAInst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a432824f0975bb863478bf4ef3a5df258">getNumOperands</a>() - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Apply all sdwa operand patterns.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Converted = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Operand : SDWAOperands) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; &#42;SDWAInst &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\nOperand: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;Operand);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There should be no intersection between SDWA operands and potential MIs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// e.g.:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// v&#95;and&#95;b32 v0, 0xff, v1 -&gt; src:v1 sel:BYTE&#95;0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// v&#95;and&#95;b32 v2, 0xff, v0 -&gt; src:v0 sel:BYTE&#95;0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// v&#95;add&#95;u32 v3, v4, v2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In that example it is possible that we would fold 2nd instruction into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3rd (v&#95;add&#95;u32&#95;sdwa) and then try to fold 1st instruction into 2nd (that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// was already destroyed). So if SDWAOperand is also a potential MI then do</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not apply it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PotentialMatches.count(Operand-&gt;getParentInst()) == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Converted |= Operand-&gt;convertToSDWA(&#42;SDWAInst, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Converted) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
